name: daovote-circuits
description: Circom circuits for DaoVote anonymous voting

scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup build/vote.r1cs pot20_final.ptau build/vote_0000.zkey
scripts.contribute: snarkjs zkey contribute build/vote_0000.zkey build/vote_final.zkey --name='DaoVote Phase 1' -v
scripts.export-vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/vote_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.export-solidity: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/vote_final.zkey build/verifier.sol
scripts.prove: snarkjs groth16 prove build/vote_final.zkey witness.wtns proof.json public.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify build/verification_key.json public.json proof.json
